headline: Jacobs Issues $1.3b Notes To Fund PA Consulting Growth Shift
summary: Jacobs Solutions (NYSE:J) has agreed to issue $1.3 billion in senior notes to help finance its acquisition of PA Consulting Group Limited. The acquisition has received strong shareholder approval and is now awaiting regulatory clearances. The deal is expected to materially expand Jacobs Solutions' consulting capabilities and reshape its overall business mix. For investors watching Jacobs Solutions at a share price of $137.86, this move comes after a 9.8% return over the past year, 38.9%...
